actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities participating in the medicaid program to pay nursing personnel at a rate at least equal to the mean rate paid nursing personnel employed outside nursing facilities.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities to pay nursing personnel at a rate at least equal to the mean rate paid nursing personnel employed outside such facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities participating in the medicaid program to pay nursing personnel at a rate at least equal to the mean rate paid nursing personnel employed outside nursing facilities.
